body_html:
@etveritas To include MKL, you need to add the lib path and include path of them into some env variables.

set CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=%cd%\\mkl\\include
set LIB=%cd%\\mkl\\lib;%LIB

As for MKLDNN, i have never tried it before. So there's nothing to tell right now.

body:
@etveritas To include MKL, you need to add the lib path and include path of them into some env variables.
```
set CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH=%cd%\\mkl\\include
set LIB=%cd%\\mkl\\lib;%LIB
```
As for MKLDNN, i have never tried it before. So there's nothing to tell right now.
